name: Not Heaven
description:
Not Heaven is an interactive world built as a platform for Wealthy Relative's 6 song rap EP with the same title. The game experience contains 6 music videos, multiple art galleries, god-like abilities, and more. It is a short third-person experience that allows the player to explore the world, paint the walls, and observe the artwork and videos. Not Heaven is the first Rap record to be released as a video game.<br/>
<br/>
"i hope you like my game, please play it"<br/>
- Wealthy Relative
